mapper.select: select * from coffeeshop where dong=#{dong} order by cname

SELECT *,(6371*acos(cos(radians(b.lat))*cos(radians(c.lat))*cos(radians(c.lng)-radians(b.lng))+sin(radians(b.lat))*sin(radians(c.lat)))) AS distance FROM coffeeshop c, (select lng, lat from houseinfo where aptName like #{aptName}) b HAVING distance <= 0.1 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0,300;
